original: KRISTOFERSON, Aron, Ingenjör, Malmö, f Moheda, Kronob l, 1/7 82, gm Helfrid Ericson. Ex Malmö tekn eleni.sk (mek) 04. Konstr v Barnängens o Gårda gjuteri o mek verkst Gbg 06, konstr f värme- o sanitetsanläggn v Gebriider Körtings i Körtingdorf Gbgs-filial 0 C A Ambrosius Ing.byrå i Malmö 07, konsult ing i värme- o sanitetstekn anläggn i Gbg 08—19, vkst dir f Skånska Rörledn.AB Celsius i Malmö sed. 20, f AB Lunds Installa-tionsaff sed. 20, f AB Kirsebergsvången i Malmö sed. 32 samt f AB Celsius i Gbg sed. 33. V. ordf i AB Sanitet i Sthlm. Led av överstyr f Sv Rörledn.fmors Frn 30—36, v. ordf i styr f Sv Värme- o Sanitetstekn Frn i Sthlm, ordf i överstyr f Rörledn.firmornas Riksfrb, flm i Sv Arb.giv.frn. Värmeledn.AB Celsius i Gbg öppn avd.kont 1 Malmö f projekt o utför av värmeledn 12. Skånska Rörledn.AB start 13, o dessa båda rörelser sammansl 25 t Rörledn.AB Celsius, som sed. 14 är huvudintress i AB Lunds In-stallationsaff o ag fil i Kkrona sed. 28. Bol övert 33 det ekon huvudintress i Värmeledn.-AB Celsius i Gbg m fil i Örebro o Linkp, vilka filialer övertogs av Rörledn.AB Celsius 35.
translated: KRISTOFERSON, Aron, Engineer, Malmö, born in Moheda, Kronoberg County, on July 1, 1882, married to Helfrid Ericson. Formerly employed at Malmö Technical Electricity Company (mechanics) in 1904. Worked as a designer at Barnängens and Gårda foundry and mechanical workshop in Gothenburg in 1906. Designed heating and sanitary installations at Gebriider Körtings in Körtingdorf, Gothenburg branch, in 1907. Joined C A Ambrosius Engineering Office in Malmö in 1907. Consulting engineer for heating and sanitation technology installations in Gothenburg from 1908 to 1919. Became the managing director of Skånska Rörlednings AB Celsius in Malmö since 1920, established AB Lunds Installationsaffär in 1920, founded AB Kirsebergsvången in Malmö in 1932, and formed AB Celsius in Gothenburg in 1933. Vice chairman of AB Sanitet in Stockholm. Member of the board of directors of Swedish Rörlednings Förbund from 1930 to 1936, vice chairman of the board of Swedish Värme- och Sanitetsteknisk Förn in Stockholm, chairman of the board of directors of Rörledningsfirmornas Riksforbund. Member of the board of directors of the Swedish Employers' Federation. Opened a branch office of Värmelednings AB Celsius in Gothenburg for project management and implementation of heating pipelines in 1912. Started Skånska Rörlednings AB in 1913, and these two businesses merged in 1925 to form Rörlednings AB Celsius, which has been the main interest in AB Lunds Installationsaffär since 1914, and also has a branch office in Karlskrona since 1928. Acquired the economic main interest in Värmelednings AB Celsius in Gothenburg, with branches in Örebro and Linköping, which were taken over by Rörlednings AB Celsius in 1935.

work.name: Barnängens and Gårda Foundry and Mechanical Workshop
